definition: to remember with reverence/to bear in mind/to keep in mind
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: Remebering that first impressions are not always correct.
sentences.chinese: 时刻谨记第一印象并不总是正确的。

sentences.english: Remember, he's a Martian and doesn't keep score the way you do.
sentences.chinese: 谨记，他是火星人，记分法和你不同。

sentences.english: Remember the five-day rule for leftovers, too.
sentences.chinese: 对剩饭菜请同样谨记五天原则。

sentences.english: A major point to keep in mind is that people will need human-machine interaction in the future.
sentences.chinese: 但我们必须谨记，在未来人们会需要人机交互技术。

sentences.english: You must bear in mind all these wise sayings.
sentences.chinese: 这些至理名言你可要谨记在心。

sentences.english: We must remember that the Cold War born in this city was not a battle for land or treasure.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须谨记，始于本市的冷战并非为了领土或财富。

sentences.english: Always remember people equate skepticism with wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 谨记，人们把怀疑态度等同于智慧。

sentences.english: Remember that grief is a natural pridator, so learn to tolerate some damage.
sentences.chinese: 谨记，悲伤是天然的猎多者，因此要学会忍受损失。

sentences.english: Remember you will only receive a harvest in proportion to what you’ve sown for.
sentences.chinese: 谨记，一分耕耘一分收获。

sentences.english: There are a few concepts that you should master in order to successfully engage and “pick up” a woman.
sentences.chinese: 为了成功吸引和追到姑娘，一些观念你必须谨记。

sentences.english: When choosing a soup, keep in mind that cream-based soups are higher in fat and calories than broth-based soups.
sentences.chinese: 点汤时，谨记奶油汤的脂肪和热量比清汤高。

sentences.english: Remember the GDS is just the data conduit….
sentences.chinese: 请谨记，GDS只是数据的中转站。

sentences.english: Even if get stumbled at one moment, keep the long term communication strategy in mind.
sentences.chinese: 即使一时之间有所磕碰，也应该谨记长期的沟通策略。

sentences.english: Wherever you go you must keep it in mind.
sentences.chinese: 无论你走到哪里，你都要谨记在心。

sentences.english: God help me to take this to heart in the testing times ahead.
sentences.chinese: 求神帮助我在未来的试炼时期将之谨记于心。

definition: you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
to remind/to call attention to/to warn of
think three times then go (idiom); don't act before you've thought it through carefully
to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart
must/to need to/to be sure to
think again and again before acting (idiom); consider carefully in advance
to repeatedly advise sb earnestly (idiom)/to admonish
to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
to save a little only to lose a lot (idiom)
to give sb a word of advice/advice/counsel/a wise word
